attributes.action: Allow a one day public holiday to celebrate the music and dance of the late King of Pop Michael Jackson on the 25th of June every year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: michael jackson the king of pop who died on the 25th june 2009 was and still is loved from all over the world for his music and dance. I think it would be fantastic if we could have michael jackson street parties with monies going to various charites on every anniversary of his death.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
